name: pairdrop
description: PairDrop is a self-hosted AirDrop-like file transfer tool using WebRTC. It allows fast device-to-device sharing over your own network without third-party services.

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Peer-to-peer sharing using WebRTC for fast, direct transfers without server intermediaries

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Works across desktop and mobile browsers on any operating system

features.title: Local Network Discovery
features.description: Automatically detects nearby devices on the same network for instant pairing

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Transfer files of any size without cloud storage restrictions or upload limits

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: All transfers are encrypted during transmission for privacy between sender and receiver

features.title: Text And Link Sharing
features.description: Share clipboard text, URLs, and messages alongside files for quick information exchange

features.title: Progressive Web App
features.description: Install as PWA on mobile devices for app-like experience with offline capabilities

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Start sharing immediately without registration for quick transfers and guest access
